- Replace all <a> tags with React Router <Link> components in Header and Footer
- Update logo paths to include /caser_official/ base path
- Fixes navigation not working when clicking menu items
- Fixes logo not displaying on deployed site

- Keep animation only in footer (animate-pulse gradient effect)
